text: Oleg Pavlovich Mirny (; born April 8, 1963) is a Russian football coach and a former player. ==External links== *Profile by the Russian Premier League ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Kuban Krasnodar players Category:FC Tyumen players Category:FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod players Category:FC Hoverla Uzhhorod players Category:Navbahor Namangan players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC KAMAZ Naberezhnye Chelny players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Russian football managers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Oleg Mirny
